TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WrappedOptions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains information required to perform schema importation using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> and infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The WrappedOptions is used by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerMessageContractImporter> and the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). The WrappedOptions class controls whether special-casing is used for document-literal styled documents with wrapped parameters. Use the **/wrapped** switch with the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](../Topic/ServiceModel%20Metadata%20Utility%20Tool%20\(Svcutil.exe\).md) tool to specify normal casing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether special-casing is used for document-wrapped-literal styled documents when parameters are unwrapped.
Docs.value: if special-casing is used for document-wrapped-literal styled documents when parameters are unwrapped; otherwise, . The default value is .
